short_title: Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act
official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit taking minors across State lines in circumvention of laws requiring the involvement of parents in abortion decisions.

short_title: Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act
official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit taking minors across State lines in circumvention of laws requiring the involvement of parents in abortion decisions.

short_title: Dismemberment Abortion Ban Act of 2016
official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit dismemberment abortions, and for other purposes.

short_title: Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act
official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit a health care practitioner from failing to exercise the proper degree of care in the case of a child who survives an abortion or attempted abortion.

short_title: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2014
official_title: To prohibit taxpayer funded abortions.

short_title: Dismemberment Abortion Ban Act of 2015
official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit dismemberment abortions, and for other purposes.

short_title: Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act
official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit family planning grants from being awarded to any entity that performs abortions, and for other purposes.

short_title: Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act
official_title: To amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit family planning grants from being awarded to any entity that performs abortions, and for other purposes.

short_title: Abortion Non-Discrimination Act of 2015
official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to prohibit certain abortion-related discrimination in governmental activities.

short_title: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act
official_title: A bill to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions and to provide for conscience protections, and for other purposes.

short_title: Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2013
official_title: A bill to amend section 1303(b)(3) of Public Law 111-148 concerning the notice requirements regarding the extent of health plan coverage of abortion and abortion premium surcharges.

short_title: Government Refusal of Abortion in Contracting and Enterprise
official_title: To prohibit the Federal Government from contracting with entities that donate or match employee donations to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc.

short_title: Post-Abortion Depression Research and Care Act of 2009
official_title: To provide for research on, and services for individuals with, post-abortion depression and psychosis.

short_title: Preventing Unintended Pregnancies, Reducing the Need for Abortion, and Supporting Parents Act
official_title: To provide for programs that reduce the number of unplanned pregnancies, reduce the need for abortion, help women bear healthy children, and support new parents.
